alert.note: Alert for Morehouse; Richland; West Carroll (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 18 at 7:18AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Morehouse, northeastern Richland and West Carroll Parishes through 800 AM CDT... At 718 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles west of Beekman to near Bastrop to near Sterlington. Movement was east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Bastrop and Collinston around 725 AM CDT. Mer Rouge and Beekman around 730 AM CDT. Galion around 735 AM CDT. Oak Ridge around 740 AM CDT. Bonita and Jones around 745 AM CDT. Goodwill around 750 AM CDT. Pioneer and Darnell around 755 AM CDT. Oak Grove, Epps and Forest around 800 AM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 AM CDT for southeastern Arkansas...and northeastern Louisiana.
